Uses of Class
laas.aadl.aadl2gspn.BooleanExpression

  • Packages that use BooleanExpression 
    Package Description
    laas.aadl.aadl2gspn  

    • Uses of BooleanExpression in laas.aadl.aadl2gspn

      Methods in laas.aadl.aadl2gspn that return BooleanExpression 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static BooleanExpression BooleanOperations.and(org.eclipse.emf.common.util.EList bes)
      This method computes the and between n boolean expressions in DNF
      static BooleanExpression BooleanOperations.not(BooleanExpression be)
      This method implements the logical operation not(expr) in which expr is a boolean expression in DNF es: !(a + bc + d) = !a.!(bc).!d = !a.(!b+!c).!d = !a.!b.!d +!a.!c!.d
      static BooleanExpression BooleanOperations.notBooleanOperand(laas.aadl.aadl2gspn.BooleanOperand bo)
      This method computes the negation of an and expression, using the rule of De Morgan !(abc...) = !a+!b+!c+...
      Methods in laas.aadl.aadl2gspn with parameters of type BooleanExpression 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static BooleanExpression BooleanOperations.not(BooleanExpression be)
      This method implements the logical operation not(expr) in which expr is a boolean expression in DNF es: !(a + bc + d) = !a.!(bc).!d = !a.(!b+!c).!d = !a.!b.!d +!a.!c!.d
